content.rendered:
The moment you set foot on campus, you’ll know that you’ve found a home.

One of the best ways to learn more about life at University of La Verne is by visiting the campus. Select one of the options below to view the tour schedule.

If you can’t attend a tour in person, take a 360 narrated virtual campus tour.
